raw_body: DR STANLEY WIJEYARATNE – Beloved husband of late Indranee,​ loving father of Malik,​ Luvinda,​ Nomal and father-in-law of Micha and Savi,​ grandfather of Leia,​ Tatiana,​ Briony and Harley,​ great grandfather of Zadie and Halle and much loved brother of Denzil and Rohini Nanayakkara and late Dudley,​ Delicia and Oswald,​ passed away peacefully on 15 December 2023. Remains will lie at A.F. Raymond’s Parlour,​ No. 115,​ D.S. Senanayake Mawatha,​ Borella on Wednesday 20th December from 9 a.m. onwards. The Buddhist Religion (Pansakulaya) Ceremony will be held on same day at 1.00 p.m. Cortege leaves the Parlour at 2.30 p.m. for Cremation at 3.00 p.m. at the General Cemetery Borella. (Old Crematorium).083722
